messages.subject: Re: I'm new here
messages.msgSnippet: Yeah, I knew that phrase you catch somebody s eye! Thanks so much for your advice. I think I have the potential to be good at unschooling- with some practice.
messages.messageBody:
Yeah, I knew that phrase you catch somebody's eye! Thanks so much for
your advice. I think I have the potential to be good at unschooling-
with some practice. I was brought up in a very rigid environment that
was anything but unschooling.








--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "Ren Allen"
<starsuncloud@...> wrote:
>
> " I usually feel like I
> have to light a fire under my daughter's butt. "
>
> If you decide to fully embrace unschooling, you'll be able to see
that
> lovely fired shining in her eyes and you won't feel the need to
doing
> any lighting under her butt.:)
>
> She's little!! Just enjoy your time together and try to free your
mind
> from the prison of "shoulds" and "have-to's". Just BE.
>
> Welcome to the list.
>
> Ren
> learninginfreedom.com
>

messages.subject: I'm new here
messages.msgSnippet: I usually feel like I have to light a fire under my daughter s butt.  If you decide to fully embrace unschooling, you ll be able to see that lovely fired
messages.messageBody:
" I usually feel like I
have to light a fire under my daughter's butt. "

If you decide to fully embrace unschooling, you'll be able to see that
lovely fired shining in her eyes and you won't feel the need to doing
any lighting under her butt.:)

She's little!! Just enjoy your time together and try to free your mind
from the prison of "shoulds" and "have-to's". Just BE.

Welcome to the list.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
